name: Shovelhands: Mystery of Booty Island
description:
Edward Shovelhands is stuck on Booty Island! Make the best out of his predicament by doing what he was born to do; Dig for treasure!

When you dig the character will tell you how close you are to the treasure.

:(        - No treasure nearby

?        - The treasure is around here somewhere

!?       - The treasure is close!

!!!       - You found it! Don't move and keep digging! 

Controls:

WASD/ arrow keys: Move

Dig: Space, Left Click, E
